name: Little Kraken
description:
The little kraken is hungry and wants to eat nice juicy ships! Guide the kraken across the sea in search for ships. Start with small defenseless ships, level up to be able to attack bigger and more powerful ships. Level up even more to get more krakens and dominate the whole sea!

Little Kraken is an action strategy game developed as a student project for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tGhkw6pFwoc

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
